mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."user"(username,nickname, password, activate ,"createDate", email,approve,"ownNum",token,"issueDate") VALUES (#{username},#{nickname} , #{password}, false ,NOW(),#{email}, false,${ownNum},#{token},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT us.id,us.username,us.password,us.nickname,us.token,us.activate,us."createDate",us.email,us.approve,ro.code as "role", us."ownNum" FROM public."user" as us join public."userRole" as ur on ur."userId" = us.id join public.role as ro on ro.id = ur."roleId" where username = #{username} order by us.id asc;
mapper.update: UPDATE public.user SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, token = #{token}, activate = #{activate}, email = #{email}, approve = #{approve} WHERE id = #{id}
